block_comment: This Verilog block defines a combinational logic for register `req_rank_ns` calculation. The block implements a nested conditional evaluation (`if-else` construct). It updates the `req_rank_ns` register based on conditions specified by `idle_ns` and `periodic_rd_insert`. If `idle_ns` holds true, it then evaluates `periodic_rd_insert` - and if this is true, `req_rank_ns` gets the value of `periodic_rd_rank_r`. If `periodic_rd_insert` is false, `req_rank_ns` is assigned the value of the `rank` register. If `idle_ns` is false, `req_rank_ns` is directly assigned the value of `req_rank_r_lcl`.
